com.cloudant.sync.datastore

Class PreparedAttachment

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.cloudant.sync.datastore.PreparedAttachment

  • public class PreparedAttachment
extends java.lang.Object
    An attachment which has been been copied to a temporary location and had its sha1 calculated, prior to being added to the datastore. In most cases, this class will only be used by the AttachmentManager and BasicDatastore classes.

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      Attachment attachment 
      long encodedLength 
      long length 
      byte[] sha1 
      java.io.File tempFile

    • Constructor Detail

      • PreparedAttachment

        public PreparedAttachment(Attachment attachment,
                          java.lang.String attachmentsDir,
                          long length,
                          com.cloudant.sync.datastore.AttachmentStreamFactory attachmentStreamFactory)
                   throws AttachmentException
        Prepare an attachment by copying it to a temp location and calculating its sha1.
        Parameters:
        attachment - The attachment to prepare
        attachmentsDir - The 'BLOB store' or location where attachments are stored for this database
        length - Length in bytes, before any encoding. This argument is ignored if the attachment is not encoded
        attachmentStreamFactory - The AttachmentStreamFactory used for writing attachment data to disk
        Throws:
        AttachmentNotSavedException - if there was an error copying the attachment or calculating its SHA1
        AttachmentException
